title: Crocodile Necropolis
description: Cave approximately 17km Northwest of El Maabdeh, Egypt where thousands of mummified crocodiles were found in addition to several other types of animals and human mummies as part of the Egyptian crocodile cult. All discoveries at this site were from the Ptolemaic or Roman periods.

properties.description: Approximate imagery location based on Google Earth representing Crocodile Necropolis after Zimmer 1987/
properties.title: Approximate imagery location of Crocodile Necropolis
